      write song metadata
      Parameters:
      id3Data - - linkedhashmap with FieldKey:String mapping
      liked - - if song is liked
      coverImage - - uri of song coverimage
      songFile - - file to write metadata to
      Throws:
      Exception - - exception when writing metadata

      Parameters:
      songFile - - song file to read metadata from
      Returns:
      - linkedhashmap of FieldKey:String with file metadata

      Exception - - exception reading metadata

    • isSongLiked

      public static boolean isSongLiked(File songFile) throws Exception
      check if local song is liked using metadata - requires 5 stars
      Parameters:
      songFile - - file to read metadata from
      Returns:
      - true if liked, false if not
      Throws:
      Exception - - exception when reading metadata
